Name: Statue of a Priest of Soknopaio Nesos Temple
Description: The statue depicts a priest of Soknopaio Nesos temple sculpted in black basalt. The priest is seated and wears a tunic with long sleeves. He is covered with a light mantle with sleeves bent to the chest.The right shoulder is broken. He has short curled hair and the eyes are incised. The rigidity of his fixed look contrasts with the realistic features of the face. The seat has a right-angle base, which serves as a footstool.
